title: Uchuu Kaizoku Captain Herlock: Arcadia-gou no Nazo
original_name: 宇宙海賊キャプテン・ハーロック　アルカディア号の謎
opening_song: "Uchu Kaizoku Captain Harlock (宇宙海賊キャプテンハーロック)" by Ichiro Mizuki
ending_song: "Warera no Tabidachi (われらの旅立ち; Our Journey)" by Ichiro Mizuki
sinopse: The story on Arcadia's mystery, on which the 13th television episode was based.
